content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 6 blocks in total
- It consists of 3 layers
- Bottom layer: A horizontal yellow block as the base
- Middle layer: Two vertical green blocks on the sides with red and blue blocks in the center
- Top layer: A horizontal yellow block

Required blocks from the dictionary (with their indices):
- 2 horizontal yellow blocks (using #11 or #12)
- 2 vertical green blocks (using #7 or #8)
- 1 red block (using #3)
- 1 blue block (using #1)

Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 11 (bottom yellow horizontal block)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (left vertical green block)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (right vertical green block)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (red block in center)
    Step5: Move block with index 1 (blue block in center below red)
    Step6: Move block with index 11 (top yellow horizontal block)
}

This assembly sequence builds the structure from bottom to top, ensuring stability throughout the construction process.
